body: I used to think neo-nazis were basically a joke, that they didn't have serious numbers and weren't actually planning the next holocaust.. boldly, in public (yet anonymous) darknet forums.  Then I looked.  I was wrong.  (They call it the 2nd Crusade, but it involves killing all Jews, then Blacks, then Mexicans, then Asians ) They have millions within their ranks already with various levels of commitment to the idea. (Some of them *are* Latinos, and think they won't be killed if they contribute to the cause sufficiently.) Its a crazy.. crazy world we live in.
